text: Pan 70 is a series of books published by Pan Books in the UK. The books were released on 7 September 2017 to celebrate the 70th anniversary of the publication of the first Pan paperback, Ten Stories by Rudyard Kipling. The books were released in A-format size, with the covers redesigned in classic technicolour. == The Books == {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! scope="col" | Title !! scope="col" | Author !! scope="col" | Pages !! scope="col" | ISBN |- | Born Free || || 464 || |- | || || 288 || |- | || || 320 || |- | Eye of the Needle || || 480 || |- | || || 320 || |- | It Shouldn't Happen to a Vet || || 304 || |- | Ten Stories || || 288 || |- | || Various || 320 || |- | Last Bus to Woodstock || || 320 || |- | Gone with the Wind || || 1024 || |- | Jaws || || 352 || |- | || || 160 || |- | Childhood's End || || 272 || |- | Dead Simple || || 480 || |- | || || 240 || |- | || || 272 || |- | || || 176 || |- | Savages || || 720 || |- | England, Their England || || 304 || |- | Not a Penny More, Not a Penny Less || || 352 || |} ==See also== * Penguin Essentials ==References== ==External links== * Official site Category:Lists of novels Category:Macmillan Publishers books
